testcase.classname: Add to cart from Recommended items
testcase.name: Test Case 22
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then User scrolls to bottom of page.........................................passed Then Verify 'RECOMMENDED ITEMS' are visible.................................passed Then Click on Add To Cart on Recommended product............................passed Then User clicks on View Cart button to see products in Cart................passed Then Verify that product from recommended is displayed in cart page........passed
